title: Signalling fault causing travel time increase

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #PasirRis & #OutramPark have resumed.
[EWL]UPDATE:Fault cleared , trains are progressively returning to normal speed. Pls add 10mins travel time btwn #PasirRis & #OutramPark.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 20mins travel time between #PasirRis & #OutramPark due to a signalling fault at #Aljunied. Train svc is still available
[EWL]: Due to a signalling fault, pls add 10mins travel time between #PasirRis & #OutramPark. Train service is still available.
